record.id: field.name="searchservername" and file.name="environment" and term=NULL and format.name="environment.km.g" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: searchservername
record.file.name: environment
record.format.name: environment.km.g

brief.brief: This is a Knowledge Management (KM) search server, to which the KM Document Type templates (Error Message/Cause, External, Question/Answer, Problem/Solution, and Reference) and KM search stop words are submitted when you click the Full Reindex button. Before you can select a search server from the list, you must have already installed the KM Search Engine and configured one or more search servers in Knowledge Management.

detail.detail: This does not have to be the same search server specified for the Knowledge Library.
